text:
Hi
Some guidance if possible please. We have implemented the HS search functionality onto a new site which we built using local dev. The search has been implemented as we would do when developing on HS DM but this search doesn't seem to be pulling in any of the pages we created. Is search suppose to be implemented a different way in local dev?
Thanks for the pointers <@U2H3TT8F2> and looking into it.

Off the back of this. Did firefox's own <https://blog.mozilla.org/blog/2020/08/04/latest-firefox-rolls-out-enhanced-tracking-protection-2-0-blocking-redirect-trackers-by-default/|ETP 2.0> have an effect on anything that you know of?

Thankfully I have tealium as well to help us ID where tracking codes might not be firing on all pages of our websites. Guess it's worth looking at what other browsers are doing similar to safari
Hi, what's the best way to create a masonry gallery with filters? Here's the page I'm working on: <https://www.peacockandco.com/project-gallery-page>
It allows for filtering as well
